name: Paul W. AITKENHEAD et al., Appellants, v. The MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Paul W. AITKENHEAD et al., Appellants, v. The MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Samuel G. Weiss, Jr., Weiss, Weiss & Weiss, Lebanon, for appellant.
Fred E. Baxter, Jr., J. Jerome Mansmann, Jane Dale Ressler, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
410 A.2d 776
Paul W. AITKENHEAD et al., Appellants, v. The MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 6, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
Samuel G. Weiss, Jr., Weiss, Weiss & Weiss, Lebanon, for appellant.
Fred E. Baxter, Jr., J. Jerome Mansmann, Jane Dale Ressler, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
